title: Indus Valley Civilization
summary:
### 🏺 Overview
One of the world's earliest urban civilizations (3300–1300 BCE).

### 🔍 Key Features
- Planned cities (Harappa, Mohenjo-daro).
- Advanced drainage systems.
- Standardized weights and measures.

### 📚 UPSC Tip
Focus on decline theories (climate change, invasion, tectonic activity).

title: Mauryan Administration
summary:
### 🏛️ Features
- Centralized monarchy under **Chandragupta Maurya**.
- **Kautilya's Arthashastra** as a policy guide.

### 🧩 Key Elements
- Provincial administration.
- Espionage system.
- Revenue collection methods.

### 📚 UPSC Tip
Link with **Ashoka’s Dhamma policy**.

title: Non-Cooperation Movement
summary:
### 📜 Timeline
- Launched: 1920.
- Led by **Mahatma Gandhi**.

### 🎯 Objectives
- Attain Swaraj.
- Boycott British goods, courts, schools.

### 🚩 End
Suspended after Chauri Chaura incident (1922).

title: Indian National Army
summary:
### 🪖 Overview
Founded by **Subhas Chandra Bose** during WWII.

### 📚 Role
- Mobilized Indians abroad for liberation.
- Adopted the slogan 'Give me blood and I will give you freedom'.

title: Quit India Movement
summary:
### 📜 Launched
1942, against British rule.

### 🔍 Significance
- Mass civil disobedience.
- ‘Do or Die’ call by Gandhi.
